title: Elon Musk’s Twitter Poll Results Favor Tesla Stock Sale
sub_head: Billionaire CEO pledged to abide by vote’s outcome after asking whether he should sell 10% of his Tesla shares
body:
Twitter users said Elon Musk should sell 10% of his Tesla Inc. stock after the billionaire chief executive polled them and pledged to abide by the outcome of the vote.
Voters backed the share sale by a wide margin, with roughly 58% in favor of a sale and 42% opposed, according to the polling data posted on Twitter. More than 3.5 million votes were cast.
